The Story

Lower Level 2.0 started as a simple VRChat world and evolved into an 18,000+ line codebase built entirely with AI collaboration. From zero UdonSharp experience to a fully-featured achievement system, interactive DOS terminal, and real-time weather integrationâ€”all developed through systematic Claude Code workflows.

The project demonstrates what's possible when combining modern AI tools with creative vision: persistent player data, cross-platform optimization, and a nostalgic 2000s basement aesthetic that feels like coming home.
